resources.string: Festival to celebrate Jesus death and resurrection. Each event starting from the dinner with the apostles to the death and burial is represented by a monument. There\'s a religious association that fund the maintenance of the monument and follows it during the week carrying in on the members shoulders.
Muixeranga is a human tower that follows the Virgin Mary in the festival that takes place in Algemes√≠.

Fallas are association of people usually belonging to the same neighourhood who meet all year round to build a monument made from woord and paper once a year that is burned at the end of the celebration.
To prevent people from living the city in summer and to attract visitors Valencia town halll started in 1871 a summer festival.
